Parameters.Name: DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
Parameters.Description: To verify getting Media Service with using GetServicesRequest

Test.Name: Correct response - Media services is returned
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features All steps are true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that Capabilities element is correct STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: No response on the first request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns no response on the first request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: No response on the second request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns no response on the second request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault on the first request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns fault on the first request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetServices(Boolean IncludeCapability) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 988 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Fault on the second request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns fault on the second request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Receiver Subcode: ActionNotSupported Subcode: NoSuchService Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 61 at DUT.CameraWebService.Device10.DeviceServiceFake.GetServices(Boolean IncludeCapability) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServiceDevice10\DeviceServiceFake.asmx.cs:line 988 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Media services is not returned on the first request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Media service is not returned on the first GetServices request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address Media service not found STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Media service is not returned on the second request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Media service is not returned on the second GetServices request.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT returned Media service address Media service not found STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Capabilities is returned on the first request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features DUT sends capabilities on the first Get Services request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned Capabilities are included in entry for Media service version '2.1' STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Capabilities is not returned on the second request
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features DUT does not send capabilities on the second Get Services request

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element Capabilities are not included in entry for Media service version '2.1' STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect Capabilities - no ProfileCapabilities
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns Capabilities without ProfileCapabilities.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
DEVICE-11-1-2 GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE
STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that Capabilities element is correct Capabilities element included in entry for Media service with version '2.1' is incorrect: The element 'Capabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl' has invalid child element 'StreamingCapabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl'. List of possible elements expected: 'ProfileCapabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

Test.Name: Incorrect Capabilities - no StreamingCapabilities
Test.Description: PreReq: FeaturesForDraftCapabilities.xml in \\TestSuit\DeviceManagment\Draft-Capabilities\ - Refresh Features Check GET SERVICES – MEDIA SERVICE test when DUT returns Capabilities without StreamingCapabilities.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:

STEP 1 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that Capabilities element is correct Capabilities element included in entry for Media service with version '2.1' is incorrect: The element 'Capabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl' has incomplete content. List of possible elements expected: 'StreamingCapabilities' in namespace 'http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl'. STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED

STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED

Test.Name: Incorrect Media Capabilities (Device capabilities instead Media capabilities)

STEP 2 - Check that DUT returned Media service address STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Check that no Capabilities returned STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Get Services Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED

STEP 6 - Check that the DUT returned Capabilities element STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Check that Capabilities element is correct Capabilities element included in entry with version '2.1' is incorrect: child element must be 'Capabilities' from namespace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/media/wsdl STEP FAILED
